Return and Refund Policy Reminder.template:
Hello {CustomerName},

We hope this message finds you well. We would like to remind you of our return and refund policy as it pertains to your recent order #[OrderNumber]. Our goal is to ensure that you are fully informed about the process and what to expect.

- **Return Window**: You have {ReturnWindow} days from the delivery date to return the item(s).
- **Refund Process**: Refunds are issued to the original payment method within {RefundProcessingTime} business days after we receive and inspect the returned item(s).
- **Condition Requirements**: Item(s) must be returned in their original condition, with all tags, packaging, and accessories included.

For more detailed information, please refer to our full return and refund policy on our website: {ReturnPolicyLink}. If you have any questions or concerns, our customer service team is available to assist you at any time.

We appreciate your attention to this matter and thank you for your continued trust in {CompanyName}.

Best regards,
{CompanyName}
{CompanyContactInfo}

- **Specific Details Needed**: {DetailsRequired}
- **How to Provide the Information**: You can reply directly to this email with the requested details, or log into your account and update the ticket: {AccountLink}.

If you have any questions or need assistance in gathering the required information, feel free to contact our support team at {SupportContactInfo}. We are here to help.
